_xResult.title: The One Hundred Linen Jacket
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made linen jacket with textured cross-hatch pattern
_xResult.longdesc:
Look other-wordly in this haute couture jacket. The slimming features will have you sliding from earth to galaxies of your wildest imagination with no trouble at all. The one-of-a-kind, hand-made linen will keep you calm, cool and collected in the face of alien creatures you may encounter. And the button-up closure with beautiful seamwork and sleeves will help you stand out amongst the rest—everyone will want a chance to encounter you.

 

Aiste bespoke made to measure jackets fit better and can be customized for length in most cases. Have sloping shoulders, or one higher than the other? Let us know and we can make adjustments.

properties.propvalue: Spot clean and hand wash cold. Dry clean ok.
